summary: Removed the floating real estate video from the projects section. The video container with all its animations, styling, and video element has been completely removed. The section now maintains the iOS 26 beta design with dynamic gradient background and floating particles, but without the floating video element.
current_status: The projects section now has a cleaner design without the floating real estate video. The section maintains all the iOS 26 beta styling including the dark theme, glass morphism effects, dynamic gradient animations, and floating particles. The main content (title, filter pills, project cards, navigation) remains unchanged with all the sophisticated animations and interactions intact.
